<a id="AudioStreamPolyphonic"></a>

# AudioStreamPolyphonic

**Inherits:** [AudioStream](AudioStream.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

AudioStream that lets the user play custom streams at any time from code, simultaneously using a single player.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

AudioStream that lets the user play custom streams at any time from code, simultaneously using a single player.

Playback control is done via the [AudioStreamPlaybackPolyphonic](AudioStreamPlaybackPolyphonic.md) instance set inside the player, which can be obtained via [AudioStreamPlayer.get_stream_playback()](AudioStreamPlayer.md#AudioStreamPlayer_method_get_stream_playback), [AudioStreamPlayer2D.get_stream_playback()](AudioStreamPlayer2D.md#AudioStreamPlayer2D_method_get_stream_playback) or [AudioStreamPlayer3D.get_stream_playback()](AudioStreamPlayer3D.md#AudioStreamPlayer3D_method_get_stream_playback) methods. Obtaining the playback instance is only valid after the ``stream`` property is set as an **AudioStreamPolyphonic** in those players.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->
